```{r setup}
library("vembedr")
```

Embedding and customizing videos in a RMarkdown document might seem like complex task. It need not be.

Even the most seemingly-intractable issues can be brought into focus with a clarifying framework:

```{r}
embed_url("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_fZQQ7o16yQ") %>%
  use_start_time("1m32")
```



```{r}
embed_url("https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=uV4UpCq2azs")
```


```{r}
embed_youtube("lGTEUtS5H7I")
```

```{r}
embed_youtube("3pKpfs5EK_s") %>%
  use_rounded()
```

```{r}
embed_youtube("KvX8MijgeW8")
```

```{r}
embed_youtube("uKQ01MvF8mY")
```

## Caveats

- Not all videos let you play embedded.
- RStudio viewer.

```{r}
embed_vimeo("45157591")
```
